description:
Kazuma is up against Kanmuri! It’s time to see who will win! Their battle is overseen by the illustrious Meister Kirisaki, who gives Kanmuri a perfect score. Can Kazuma hope to win against a scientific genius who graduated from Harvard at a young age?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sora Tobu Meister!! Katsu no wa Docchi!?
The Flying Meister!! Who Will Win!?
มาสเตอร์เหินฟ้า ฝ่ายไหนจะชนะ
空飛ぶマイスター!! 勝つのはどっち!?
